message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a substantial discount and a chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
